title: GIveaway RP during any holidays
body: Does Riot ever giveaway free RP during holidays or special events? i remember a long time ago during Christmas they did but i wonder if they still do it.

replies.body:
Each event is pretty unique now, so you never know what's going to happen. I don't know what's in store for the holiday season this year, but I recommend keeping your eyes on the [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) for any special announcements. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
